Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of at least one line of black-painted hieratic text. Another, currently unnumbered fragment, may constitute part of the same vessel.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393535) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393535)
